resources.string: Mobiticket is a service to enables you book, pay and get bus tickets using your phone. \nTicket reservations and payments can be done using MPESA checkout or using your mobile wallet for our partner public service bus operators. \nMobiticket connects you directly to bus operators.

1. Go to the MPESA menu, 
 2. Select payment services 
 3. Choose Pay Bill option
 4. Enter ***** as the business number 
 5. Enter MA00**** name as the account number 
 6. Enter the amount 
 7. Enter your pin and press Ok
1.After successful download,download will be opened automatically. \n2.Click on the app to Install. \n3.Enjoy the improved app
